results.name: Array of coefficients of 1/det(M_n)*P(M_n) where P(M_n) is the characteristic polynomial of M_n, the n-th n X n Hilbert matrix M_n(i,j)=1/(i+j-1).
comment: Montgomery made a conjecture related to the largest eigenvalue of the Hilbert matrix (cf. link)
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..902
maple: f:= proc(n) uses LinearAlgebra; local P,M;
mathematica: row[n_] := Module[{P, M, x}, M = HilbertMatrix[n]; P = CharacteristicPolynomial[M, x]/Det[M]; (-1)^n CoefficientList[P, x]];
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Nov 27 2002
